item.title: How to Hack Anything 0x01
item.description: Photo by Photo by Thilak Lees on Unsplash This article contains some of my advice on how to go deep and what can be done to start getting up to speed on Information Risk in your first 3 hours. Mark the books you should read [10 minutes to order some books or add them to a queue]: Measuring and Managing Information Risk: A FAIR Approach How to Measure Anything in Cybersecurity Risk Against the Gods: The Remarkable Story of Risk Then just go ahead and dig into The Society of Information Risk Analysts Recommended Reading I recommend picking these two up at the same time and reading them in the order listed.
